cause.description:
Our team's fundraising goal is $100.00. Please help us raise or goal, or consider joining our team and walking for hope. Every penny helps, and no donation is too small. My boys are collecting all their pennies for their contribution
Go to http://www.active.com/donate/ltnBrookf3/2036_shechrissy to join or donate!
1. The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society is the world's largest voluntary health organization dedicated to funding blood cancer research, education, and patient services. The Society's mission: Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma, and improve th
2. Go to http://www.active.com/donate/ltnBrookf3/2036_shechrissy
cause.mission: Raise donations from supporters in memory of my dad, David Stanek. All funds will go towards finding a cure for lukemia, lymphoma and other blood cancers.
cause.name: Lukemia and Lymphoma Society - Light the Night Walk in Madison Wisconsin - Team David
